revised_title: The Role of Science in Post-War Society and the Future of the Royal Society
tldr: The Anniversary Dinner of the Royal Society in 1945 brought together prominent figures to discuss the role of science in post-war society. The attendees emphasized the importance of scientific advancements for defense and peace, as well as the need for international collaboration. They also addressed the challenges faced by the Royal Society, including the need for a new home to accommodate its growing number of fellows.
